txt.en: Mix disgusting concoction in mixing bowl

'You nice guys and save me from nasty infected Orcs. I help you out and fix green-cloak. His name Rhadrog? Yes, but we can do better. We form partnership. You hate Orcs, I hate Orcs, we good team. I the brains, you the muscle! It will be great! Talk it over with grumpy guy.'
The disgusting concoction has been created and awaits you in Viznak's hideout.\n\nYou should bravely attempt to ingest the disgusting concoction.
It's the worst thing you've ever tasted!
Faeron and Rhadrog can be found in Viznak's hideout.\n\nYou should give the disgusting concoction to both of the Rangers.
Viznak has been rescued and decides to help you save Rhadrog. Gather ingredients from the wilds of Agarnaith and brew a concoction to counteract the virulent disease.
Rhadrog seems less tense almost immediately
Viznak can be found in his hideout.\n\nYou should talk to Viznak.
It is the worst thing you have ever tasted!

'Glad you are back. Rhadrog's situation is dire. I have managed to get some information out of our new 'friend' here.  Seregost lies to the north-east, at the end of the swamp, and he made it sound massive. He also mentioned that the 'Blight Lady' rules Agarnaith. I know not what manner of creature he speaks of, but he seemed frightened at the mere mention of her.\n\n'I have to drink this liquid, then? Well, you are still alive. I guess I will take my chances.'
Faeron can be found in Viznak's hideout.\n\nYou should talk to Faeron about Viznak's proposition.

'He wants to be partners?! There must be some ulterior motive. I have never known a goblin to not be a scheming little ball of slime. Regardless of how much I want to strangle him, we must work with him for now, or we stand no chance of survival in this disgusting bog. Perhaps we can even learn enough about Seregost and its leader to report back some useful information before we are inevitably betrayed.'
Viznak can be found in his hideout.\n\nYou should talk to Viznak.

'Good! We friends now. First thing, fix sickness! I discover making tasty drink from swamp stuff make it go away! Don't know how, don't care. You go get stuff, mix in bowl, and drink! All better. You and grumpy better drink it, too. You not sick now, but you will be! Here, I make you list.'\n\nHe hands you some grubby paper with drawings on it. You think you can decipher what this means.

Viznak has provided a list of ingredients that can be found in the wilds of Agarnaith.\n\nInfected livers can be collected from gore-crows, wolves, boars, and rats. Infected insect guts can be collected from sickle-flies, nerbyg, and swarming flies. You should collect infected livers, plague mushrooms, swamp water, and infected insect guts.
Viznak mentioned he had a mixing bowl in his hideout.\n\nYou should mix the ingredients together in the mixing bowl.
The ingredients mush together into a thick, foul-smelling liquid
'Tasty, right? Why you make faces?\n\n'Rhadrog better soon. Needs sleep now. Let's get to work!'
